question: The product concept focuses on ________.

answers.text: the quality of the product a company intends to sell

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. The marketing concept is concerned with meeting the needs of the customer.

answers.text: the operations of manufacturing the product a company intends to sell

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. The selling concept is concerned with the selling strategies a company will use to sell the product.

answers.text: the selling strategies a company will use to sell the product

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. The production concept is concerned with the operations of manufacturing the product a company intends to sell.
The product concept is concerned most with the quality of the product a company intends to sell.

detailedSolution: The product concept is concerned most with the quality of the product a company intends to sell.
